casebody.data:
Third Department,

January, 1938.

(January 12, 1938.) Florence Cronin, as Administratrix, etc., of Bartley Cronin, Deceased, Appellant, v. The State of New York, Respondent. (Claim No. 24027.)

Motion for leave to appeal as a poor person and to dispense with printing of record and brief, and to submit appeal on typewritten record and brief, granted; and Rosenblatt & Spielberg, of 154 Nassau street, New York city, are assigned to prosecute the appeal on behalf of the claimant in accordance with the provisions of rules 35 and 36 of the Rules of Civil Practice. Present — Hill, P. J., Rhodes, McNamee, Bliss and Heffernan, JJ.
